text: Rather than letting herself sulk in self - pity, the performer chose to view the rough patch as a learning experience. She explained, “ Music is my first love and I think it was the universe saying : ‘ Okay, you speak all of this language about self - love and authenticity, but we are going to put you through another test and take away any kind of validating ‘ blankie. ’ Then we ’ ll see how much you do truly love yourself.'” She continued on to say, “ That brokenness, plus me opening up to a greater, higher power and reconnecting with divinity, gave me a wholeness I never had. It gave me a new foundation. It ’ s not just a material foundation : it ’ s a soul foundation. ” This spiritual awakening comes as no surprise
